backend/main.mo: Main canister logic managing user profiles, daily orders, and karigar assignments with admin/user authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old actor state to the new format by adding design fields and initializing design-to-karigar mapping.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for daily-orders functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in daily orders, parsing, UI, and export features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the XLSX parser via CDN and bootstrapping the frontend application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup, and rendering the Daily Orders page layout.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog UI for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory.
Exports selected karigar’s orders to a PDF using exportKarigarPdf.
Sidebar listing karigars and their order counts, enabling filtering by karigar.
Displays mapping summary stats and allows applying design-to-karigar mappings with overwrite option.
Table showing orders with selection checkboxes and existing karigar assignments.
Toolbar providing search and design-based sort controls for orders.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main page managing daily orders, file uploads, filtering, karigar grouping, mapping, and assignment logic.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Parses CSV or Excel daily orders files, validates required columns, and outputs structured ParsedOrder data.
Reads Excel sheets 1–3 and extracts design-to-karigar mappings using XLSX, returning a combined mapping object.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sort filtering for parsed orders based on text input and design sorting.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML-based PDF-like report for a karigar’s daily orders and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to load and mutate user profiles, daily orders, and karigar assignments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Defines global TypeScript types for the XLSX library attached to window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for app state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings with several plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an order‑management app with Excel uploads, mapping workbook logic, feature list, and architectural notes.
